title: GIFT
body:
why can't i send a gift of skin to my friend??

my friend doesn't show up on the list of my current and accepted friends, however, he is on my current friend list.  I don't understand this 

fix it please.

replies.body:
It's kinda hard to know exactly what might be going on without know who you're trying to send the gift too. They might not have been on your friends list for a full day (one of the requirements) or they might have some kind of punishment on their account?

https://i.gyazo.com/a8d78f793eb7fc6c90aaed1fdef447a9.png
